name: EX REL. BARBARA BRYANT FOREIGN ESTATE, Petitioner v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA BOARD OF PENSIONS & RETIREMENT, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Ex rel. Barbara Bryant Foreign Estate v. City of Philadelphia Board of Pensions & Retirement

parties: EX REL. BARBARA BRYANT FOREIGN ESTATE, Petitioner v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA BOARD OF PENSIONS & RETIREMENT, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of May, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
115 A.3d 311
EX REL. BARBARA BRYANT FOREIGN ESTATE, Petitioner v. CITY OF PHILADELPHIA BOARD OF PENSIONS & RETIREMENT, Respondent.
No. 38 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 29, 2015.
